
                            
                            <p>乙肝连续复查好多年了，乙肝两对半 145 阳， <br> 之前 乙肝DNA定量 数值都比较小，医生没有建议用药，今年复查1.78*10^2， <br> 医生建议用药，给了三种药选择：富马酸替诺福韦二吡呋酯片、恩替卡韦、韦立得富马酸丙酚替诺福韦片 <br> 吧友看看，建议用哪种药 <br> 先谢过吧友们 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200808vmvvls3a2rre24gm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200808vmvvls3a2rre24gm.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200808ioo1kfyuryvczzp1.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200808ioo1kfyuryvczzp1.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200809bz5lh0hn8500qbqy.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200809bz5lh0hn8500qbqy.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200806r61r81p6y8y83lyl.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/10/200806r61r81p6y8y83lyl.jpg"> <br>  <br>  </p>
